short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View images, send emails, email templates, inline posting details, drive direction, all in the listing page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When viewing Craigslist listing, the addon shows preview images, text within the same windows. It let users send emails automatically on filtered items, send emails from saved drafts, create saved filters with keywords and prices, view post details, map location, map drive direction, and mark spam. There are many configurable options. The user interface is very easy to use, and customisable.
